physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 9 x 11 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: On envelope: ''#1064 Fried's Framing and Gift Shop 1900-40s.'' On photograph: ''Fried's Gift Shop - 1522 Stout, about 1935, #1064.'' ''Rocky Mt. Photo Co., 0575 Denver.''

mods.abstract: Exterior view of the front of Fried's Gift Shop. Fried's Picture Frame Factory was the first framing store in Denver and later became an art and gift shop.

name.namePart: Fried's Art and Gift Shop (Denver, Colo.)
